body.p: Born in New Kent County, Virginia. Moved to Perry Park, Kentucky, around 1810. Admitted to the Owen County Bar in 1822. Appointed superintendent of the courthouse in Owenton and as Postmaster in 1823. On May 11, 1824, he married Lucy Harriet Gower. Purchased his first lot of land in 1823. Married Lucy H. Gower in 1824. Father to one child, Ann Mary, born on May 25, 1825.
